post.author: 이상윤
post.content:
Monster 에서 받은 메일 입니다. 전화 통화를 했었는데 캐나다 시민권자를 요구 합니다.

Hi,



We have reviewed your resume on Monster and a client of ours has a position available that we thought you might be interested in.



We have an Application Engineer position available in Lincoln Park, MI. This is a 1 year plus contract position.



Responsibilities:



Perform programming, debug and some development of diagnostic software for automotive supplier using C++. Conduct documentation and status reports of projects along with some customer interaction. Work in team environment.



Skills:                                                              Years of Exp. Reqd



C++ or Visual C++ required                               3 to 5 yr

MFC                                                                     3 to 5 yr

COM, DCOM                                                       3 to 4 yr

SQL                                                                     1 to 2 yr

Database Exp                                                     1 to 2 yr





If you are interested in the position, please feel free to e-mail us at the address given below along with a word formatted resume of yours giving details of the projects you have done and the number of years of experience you have in the above mentioned skill sets and information about the following:



1. Salary estimate that you would like to start with.

2. Date of availability.

3. Updated word formatted resume.





Please make sure that the resume is a detailed one with elaboration of all the projects you have done in the key areas like C++, COM/DCOM, MFC , SQL & Database which will add points to your candidature



If you are not in the market at this time feel free to forward this information to a friend or associate that has identical skills and might be interested in this position.



Thank you very much,



Andy

Technical Recruiter

phone - 248-246-1753

Systems Technology International

andy@sti-world.com
post.title: Job Offer from STI ("Application Engineer")
